definition: almost/nearly
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]
to send/to commission/messenger/mission

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
erhua variant of 差點|差点[cha4 dian3]
almost/nearly/(i.e. same as 差點|差点[cha4 dian3])

sentences.english: They might be,for example,in an accident, and come close to being killed,but walk away without a scratch.
sentences.chinese: 比如说在事故中幸存，差点送命，但结果毫发无伤。

sentences.english: His last illness almost did him in.
sentences.chinese: 上一次的生病差点让他性命不保。

sentences.english: In 1955, he was hospitalized for a bleeding ulcer which was nearly fatal.
sentences.chinese: 1955年，一场差点致命的呕血让他住进医院。

sentences.english: I oversleep again this morning and was almost late for work.
sentences.chinese: 本日早上又睡过甚了，上班差点迟到。

sentences.english: It made many people die and even made Nado go to hell.
sentences.chinese: 它使得很多人死去，甚至差点把那多送西天。

sentences.english: That was a close call.We nearly hit that car.
sentences.chinese: 真是好险啊，我们差点撞上那辆汽车。

sentences.english: I nearly ran into a lamppost.
sentences.chinese: 我差点把车撞到路灯柱上。

sentences.english: It was a 11)dirty trick, but it killed old Phoebe.
sentences.chinese: 这实在是种卑鄙把戏，可差点儿把老菲比笑死。

sentences.english: I step off the kerb and a cyclistnearly knocks me down.
sentences.chinese: 我从台阶上走下来一个汽车的人差点把我撞倒。

sentences.english: You almost gave me a heart attack.
sentences.chinese: 你差点把我吓出心脏病。

sentences.english: Is a , have already dripped on the floor, Grey UGG Boots, almost hit in his instep.
sentences.chinese: 一声，已经掉在地上，差点就砸到他的脚面上。

sentences.english: He almost lost his thumb doing it last time, " Glenday said."
sentences.chinese: 在上次表演时，他的手指差点被蛇咬掉。

sentences.english: He nearly ran into a large man who suddenly came in through the doorway.
sentences.chinese: 他差点与一位突然闯进的大个子男人撞个满怀。

sentences.english: I almost didn't from three rounds car planted down.
sentences.chinese: 我差点没从3轮车上栽下来。

sentences.english: Ensnared in maya, I am all but dead.
sentences.chinese: 在摩耶的诱捕下，我差点儿死去。

sentences.english: Oh, I almost forgot about dried tofu.
